name: Pop-'N-Kart (Super-Duper-Pre-Alpha)
description:
Controls: 

  • W - Accelerate
  • A & D - Steering
  • Space - Drift
  • E - activate/deactivate Soda Boost

While using the Soda Boost, your soda drains 1 unit per second. Drifting naturally charges up your soda, at a rate slightly faster than the boost drains. Therefore, if you keep drifting you keep your boost.

(Wall collisions are currently somewhat buggy and there isn't much penalty for bumping into them. Expect that to change)
